fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player. You will grant them Basic defense for the night and all Town members who visited them will learn your identity.
- Choose a role you have won as in a previous game. You may use an ability of that role.
- Choose two words each night. You will learn the name of every living player who has either of those words in their role's abilities or attributes.
**Cascade Incantation** â€” Choose a word at night. You will deal a Powerful attack to every other living player who has that word in their role's abilities or attributes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only use each of your abilities twice.
- Once you have used three different abilities, you may no longer use the fourth.
